籤詩版本二:
A cone of grass asks for a spring
The hardest thing to achieve is to work hard
Suddenly meeting a close friend by chance
Meet and go to the sky hand in hand
詩意: This hexagram cone ground seeks the image of a spring. Everything is difficult before it becomes easy later.
解曰: Desires and thoughts. The West is available. It's better not to move. There is a place to be found.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liu Chen meets the immortal
In the Eastern Han Dynasty, Liu Chen and Ruan Zhaoguo went into the mountains to collect herbs and met two fairies.
The two got married to the fairy and returned home half a year later. Little did they know that a hundred years had passed since they returned home.
No one recognized them, so they returned to the mountains to look for the fairy, but they could not find her.
聖意:
House and home pray for blessings.
Self-interest.
Seeking financial gain.
Transaction.
Marriage.
Liujia: An.
Pedestrian: Late.
Field silkworms should be planted early.


Six animals are damaged.
Looking for someone to meet.
Public litigation should be peaceful.
Migration is lucky.
Lost property is missing.
Disease 禳星.
Mountain tomb is auspicious.
